Newbie Guide:
Are you ready for a new mission?
After swapping the Weapon Exchange Ticket you received previously with the Non-Grade Shadow Weapon, go visit %tonpc% and return after receiving quest reward. To find %tonpc%, follow the arrow above your head. I will tell you more later.
Can I help you with anything else?
Ask for advice.
Find NPC.
Recive blessing of protection.
Teleport to another village.
Give me some support magic.
Tell me about novice characters.
Ask for help with a newbie item.
